body.name: VooBang Bathroom Mirror 30x48 inch, Black Gorgeous Deep Frame Wall Mirror, Modern Round Corner Bathroom Vanity Mirror for Bedroom, Living Room, Hanging or Leaning Horizontal or Vertical, Black
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 15 hrs 50 mins
features: Durable HD Nanoglass: The deep frame bathroom mirror made of high-definition glass that does not distort the image at any angle. The technologically improved nano glass is sturdy and not fragile, and the metal frame endows it with shockproof, more stable, and longer lifespan

Aluminum Alloy Frame: The gorgeous black bathroom mirror is made of high-quality aluminum alloy frame material, which is lightweight and not easy to deform or paint off, making it an ideal hanging mirror. The highly metallic appearance makes the room even more outstanding

Suitable For Various Themes: A beautiful wall mounted mirror can enhance the effect of home decoration. The deep frame design is more advanced and is a perfect complement to bathrooms, restaurants, living rooms or corridors. Equally nice for farmhouse and industrial style rooms

Easy To Install: Includes instruction and all installation accessories. The installation of cleat hook is simpler and can be completed within 10 minutes. The design of rectangular bathroom vanity mirrors and two sets of hooks allow you to hang horizontally or vertically

Sturdy Packaging: With 20 years of production experience, we have high requirements for product quality. The packaging of the wall mirror has passed international drop testing and is more sturdy. If encountering special circumstances, we will immediately provide a solution

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install, one person job
reviews.reviewText: I am very happy with this mirror, it is exactly what I hoped it would be. I had a wall mirror in a chrome track but when I got a new counter/backsplash it was not a good look anymore, it covered the beauty of my backsplash. I hung this mirror in its place above the two sink counter and it looks wonderful. good quality. I installed it myself very easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and well designed
reviews.reviewText: As others have noted, this is easy to hang. Once mounted, it sits flush to the wall. The frame is easy to wipe clean with a dry microfiber cloth. The mirror itself is accurate and provides surprising depth. I bought this as part of a bathroom remodeling project and it is well worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you're shopping this - stop here!
reviews.reviewText: If you're shopping for this style mirror and looking for a less expensive option - stop here! This mirror is fantastic. It is high quality, the mounting system is actually really, really, nice, and it looks just like the competitors at 1/3 of the price! Do it! Will be ordering another one when the next project is up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Value for a Modern Mirror
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this mirror to be used in a small, very old, and outdated bathroom that is going to be renovated very soon. The clean lines of this mirror and the black finish of the frame will fit very well in the modern and minimalist style I am going for. The mirror was delivered in a parcel that was a little beat up on the outside but there was no damage to the mirror itself, as the mirror was well-protected from the rough handling inside the box. The quality of the mirror is very good in terms of the image being reflected but also it seems that the fabrication of the mirror used quality materials and was done with attention to detail. I was particularly impressed with the mounting system used for this mirror; it will provide for a very solid mount to the wall regardless of the orientation chosen, but also greatly facilitate the installation. Time will tell how the mirror fares in the humid environment of a bathroom but at first glance, I am very satisfied with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning, excellent quality
reviews.reviewText: We ordered 2 of these 2-3 years ago and they are beautiful. We moved house so I can’t take photos of them, but until the day we moved out, I admired their quality and what a statement 2 of them next to each other over a double vanity made.We had marble look porcelain tiles from vanity to ceiling with gold/brass and glass sconces - the gold frame was absolutely stunning and definitely looked much more expensive than they cost.We’ll be updating our new house after we’ve settled in and figured things out but I already know I’ll be ordering these again for our bathroom updates

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these mirrors!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered two of these mirrors as a part of a facelift for my bathroom and they look great! Installation was really easy and they look much more expensive than they were.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I shopped around before purchasing this mirror, it has the best price for this size. It was fairly easy to install, heavy but manageable. I love how it looks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Redid our small bathroom and got this to use as a very tall mirror to the ceiling like you see in hotels. It seems very sturdy, good quality, and I think it looks beautiful. Very pleased.
